name: Egg Racer
description:
It's a race, with an egg.

Controls:

  • Click anywhere on the screen to move the Egg toward this point.
  • The further you click, the faster the Egg will move.

This game was done for the Weekly Hour Game Jam - W20 2017 in 1 hour.

The theme was: Egg Cup

Music: Casual Level byJohn Leonard French (from Ultimate Game Music Collection)
